description: Building a “cashless” campus with mobile payment
Scenario: Sam is a college student living at a dorm, where his life revolves around campus. One day he grabs some snacks at a campus store to check out, only to find out he has forgotten to bring his wallet. All he has is his student ID.
pain_points_and_needs: •	 From the point of view of students, sometimes it is troublesome to bring cash, cards and phones as payment method
•	 From the point of view of vendors, sometimes these payment methods may lead to difficulties in interfacing with each other, reconciling accounts, and managing the payment service
smart_solution: This solution integrates various payment methods (Electronic Ticketing, Mobile Payment, Credit Card) into one student ID to develop an integrated mobile payment platform, and signal detection techniques at locations such as the dormitory gates on campus, library checkout counters, store checkout counters, vending machines, and off-campus shopping districts. The service is rolling out throughout more than a dozen universities.
adopted_technology: Big data analytics on payment activities , IoT, signal detections
benefits: •	 Integrates four major electronic tickets and over six kinds of payment methods
•	 Helps vendors transition into providing cashless payment options
solution_description: This solution integrates various non-cash payment methods into one single payment platform on student ID. Cashless payments are made possible for university students, stores to check balances and providing electronic receipts, as well as to fulfill the needs for libraries, dormitories and micro-stores to be easily managed.
reference_site: Yunlin County, Chiayi County, Chiayi City, and Tainan City
